meaningMnemonic: You slip off the <radical>roof</radical>, your <radical>life</radical> flashes before your eyes, and you smash your <radical>mouth</radical> on the ground causing some serious <kanji>damage</kanji>. Oof, this is a really bad <kanji>injury</kanji>, you fell all the way off the roof and onto your mouth.
readingMnemonic: As you try to assess the <kanji>damage</kanji>, you hear someone shout, "<reading>Guy</reading> (がい), hey, you okay, guy?" They run up to you, but your mouth is too <kanji>damage</kanji>d, you can't respond. "Okay guy, I'm gonna call you Guy now. Let's get you to the hospital."
